original_text: Jesus went into a house and the blind men came to him there. Jesus asked them, ‘Do you believe that I can make your eyes become well?’ The men replied, ‘Yes, Master, we believe that you can do this.’
korean_text: 예수께서 집에 들어가시매 맹인들이 그에게 나아오거늘 예수께서 이르시되 내가 능히 이 일 할 줄을 믿느냐 대답하되 주여 그러하오이다 하니

sentences.original_text: and the blind men came to him there
Do you believe that I can make your eyes become well
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희의 눈을 낫게 할 수 있다고 믿느냐

sentences.original_text: we believe that you can do this
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 이것을 할 수 있다고 믿습니다
